Articles.Content: So im pretty sure, that you can hold extra kerbals in empty fuel tanks, and I also saw a video on youtube where somebody boarded a craft and had a 4th kerbal.. So, how? And in the case that it was a mod or something.. Oh well So far, I\'ve tried just boarding on the command pod, and can\'t fit it in, and just going up to an empty fuel tank gives me nothing. Any help would be appreciated, Thanks!

There\'s only one mod I\'ve seen so far. It\'s technically a fuel container with 400 kg of fuel, but it holds 5 kerbals. It\'s pretty good. If you have mechjeb and put one on the pod, you can disconnect from the command pod and fly the container down to the planet while the CM stays in orbit. I believe it\'s called 'DYJcrewtankT'
Ahh thanks, I was confused, I had thought this was part of stock at first :-[
